system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.x0nG5fvFuZUAMz05]{Evasive Martial Arts}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.hklX41S7ovugpEnQ]{Combat Throw}

Benefits

A successful trip attempt by the character deals damage as they would with an unarmed strike.

Special

If a character has any feats that allow them to modify their unarmed strike damage without penalty or increase the damage that unarmed attacks cause, these increase the damage done by this feat.
